effect_entries.effect: Held: HP restored from Absorb, Aqua Ring, Drain Punch, Dream Eater, Giga Drain, Ingrain, Leech Life, Leech Seed, and Mega Drain is increased by 30%.  Damage inflicted is not affected.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases HP recovered from draining moves, Ingrain, and Aqua Ring by 3/10 (30%).

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of HP-stealing moves so the holder recovers more HP.
